data.title: Wealden District Council
data.text:
Pine Grove, Crowborough

Tel: 01892 653311

Vicarage Lane, Hailsham

Tel: 01323 443322

Wealden is a larger Council covering the western half of East Sussex. The Council has offices in Crowborough and Hailsham. Wealden provides the following services:-

Building Regulations (C)&(H)

Housing (H)

Bottle Bank (H)

Planning (C)

Refuse Collection (H)

Collection of Council Tax (H)

Leisure (H)

Public Cleaning (H)

Environmental Health (H)

Public Protection (H)

Dog Warden (H)

Civil Protection (C) (In conjunction with County Council)

Wealden has a comprehensive website which can be found at www.wealden.gov.uk. The site offers all manner of information of Wealden and the services it provides, in addition it provides links to other helpful resources.

There are a total of 55 councillors on Wealden Council, of which 8 represent Crowborough wards. The 8 Crowborough representatives are as follows: -
